title: Looking for players to Skype with. (normals/ranked) S4 plat, S5 gold
body:
Hi there i'm just looking for anybody that might be interested in playing with some friendly people who don't overreact and argue over small matters for too long.

Recently i've been slowly having my drive gutted by the direction of the patches (4.21 - 5.4) so i don't have quite as much fun solo as i used to.

would really like to get my drive back while playing this game maybe through some interaction with some people who are nice to play with and chat.

if your interested add me and ask for a game or 2.

been playing for a long time and i even still maintained my NA account under the same name up until the end of S5. if your looking to just have someone there you wanna practice with i can do that too.

main roles im playing these days are adc/support/mid with supportive type of top/jg picks

ty for your time and hopefully ill stop having to use mute all function every game :0

replies.body:
How long have you been playing? Since the closed beta? I started a chat on oce king rammus players  (closed beta) I got a group of irl mates who have been playing since then. Only one of us has got to gold. (But in our defence he's played heaps in ranked and we haven't really). 
They will be shy to Skype, but could add you for a norm game sometime if you like.

sure thing . thats quite alright. i recall seeing that 'chat with king rammus players ...' somewhere. maybe when i was browsing reddit? o,0

exact time i would that i started was maybe a month or two before darius got released and at that time i leveled up and learnt the game while i was on holiday in south east asia on Garena server and NA servers
yo man, i have a couple matees and a teamspeak server , we arent high ranked or very good but if you ever want to play some norms or aram hit me up.

hmm im not to fond or arams except playing with irl friends, but thank you very much for the offer!

sorry its mainly bc i play too much ranked >,<

ill keep you in mind though if im feeling up for it :)
